product_name: BOBBI BROWNVitamin Enriched Hydrating Skin Tint SPF 15
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingHSA/FSA eligibleBobbi Brown Vitamin Enriched Hydrating Skin Tint SPF 15 with Hyaluronic Acid is a 2-in-1 skin tint that moisturizes while delivering fresh, natural-looking coverage that's skin-true, more you.
details: DetailsBenefitsGives skin a boost of moisture and just-right coverageMelts seamlessly into skin with sheer coverage that adapts to a range of skin tonesHelps replenish and condition skin with essential nourishmentHelps strengthen skin's barrierHelps protect from environmental aggressorsFeaturesPigment-Flex Technology features specially coated pigments that help shades melt seamlessly into skin with sheer coverage that adapts to a range of skin tonesLightweight, sweat and humidity-resistant formula stays color-true for 12 hours of non-fading, non-creasing, non-settling wearSPF 15 helps prevent UVA and UVB rays from damaging skinClinical results: 12-hour moisture and color-true wear. Non-fading, non-creasing, non-settling, sweat and humidity-resistantKey IngredientsSignature blend of Vitamins B, C, and E helps replenish and condition skin with essential nourishmentPro-Vitamin D and Cactus flower help strengthen skin's barrierVitamin E Complex helps defend skin from environmental aggressorsHyaluronic Acid helps instantly moisturize while Shea Butter helps soften and conditionRefreshing scent of Grapefruit and Geranium uplifts the sensesItem 2612309How To UseUse fingers or a foundation brush to blend product onto skin, starting at the center of the face. After product is applied evenly, use the warmth of fingers to melt the product into skin.IngredientsWater\Aqua\Eau, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Glyceryl Triacetyl Ricinoleate, Octyldodecyl Neopentanoate, Diethylhexyl Succinate, Butylene Glycol, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Titanium Dioxide, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Glycerin, Steareth-21, Glyceryl Stearate, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Pelargonium Graveolens (Geranium) Flower Oil, Cereus Grandiflorus (Cactus) Flower Extract, Lactobacillus Ferment, Niacinamide, Ethylhexylglycerin, Caprylyl Glycol, Cholesterol, Isohexadecane, 7-Dehydrocholesterol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Biosaccharide Gum-1, Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Aluminum Hydroxide, Steareth-2, Cetyl Alcohol, Acrylamide/Sodium Acryloyldimethyltaurate Copolymer, Xanthan Gum, Lecithin, Potassium Stearate, Sodium Hydroxide, Polysorbate 80, Sorbitan Oleate, Citric Acid, Limonene, Citronellol, Geraniol, Linalool, Citral, Tocopheryl Acetate, Bht, Phytic Acid, Disodium Edta, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Phenoxyethanol, Sorbic Acid, [+/- Mica, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Iron Oxides (CI 77499)]Ingredients are subject to change at the manufacturer's discretion. For the most complete and up-to-date list of ingredients, refer to the product packaging.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use fingers or a foundation brush to blend product onto skin, starting at the center of the face. After product is applied evenly, use the warmth of fingers to melt the product into skin.

reviews.headline: This was Ok!
reviews.comments: The online shade matching tool didnt work out well for me. Theres a very yellowish tint. That being said, the actual product is fine, feels lightweight enough. Landed up using a tan setting powder to offset the yellowness.

reviews.headline: not great for price
reviews.comments: Very liquid consistency. I found it hard to blend since it stuck to dry patches and seemed to catch and pill. Not much coverage either.

reviews.headline: Terrible! Separates/migrates.
reviews.comments: I was looking for light coverage with SPF at Ulta. One of the employees put the product on me and it actually looks OK in store. I should've walked around and then rechecked it because it separates and is cakey on some areas of my face. I've made sure my face was clean/dry/smooth (I've done both laser, hair removal and electrolysis). I tried applying with a sponge, my fingers and with a brush. It always turned out terribly. The liquid is quite thin and leaks immediately when you open the top. So if you are not careful it will spill. I didn't even make it halfway through before giving up and throwing it away. What a waste of money.

reviews.headline: Love this
reviews.comments: Love this moisturizing skin tint.  And I love that its light as I'm not a foundation girl

reviews.headline: Pleased, would repurchase
reviews.comments: Nice tint that provides godo coveragd. I use with a primer.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: Love the product is usually hard to find a skin tent that is good for my complexion would definitely recommend a brown skin girls and who doesn't love a skin tint with SPF in it

reviews.headline: I can take it or leave it
reviews.comments: 3/5, I don't know how I feel about this one. It does make you look dewy and glowy, but it does not stay put for so long. It is very oily.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: This stuff is amazing! My skin glows!

reviews.headline: Hard Pass
reviews.comments: This formula is streaky and patchy. Does not blend well.

reviews.headline: Happy with the results
reviews.comments: I bought this because I like the Bobbi Brown face primer. I enjoy the citrus scent of both. My skin feels great after application. The coverage is light and sheer but lasts. I apply it with a beauty blender sponge. I took a star off because coverage appears patchy on my neck. The packaging is easy to use.

reviews.headline: Amazing Product!
reviews.comments: My mother, in her mid 50's, absolutely loves this product. It feels great, has buildable coverage and has a great color to it. It looks great on older skin and has a very youthful glow.

reviews.headline: Streaky and clings to my dry spots Ôøº
reviews.comments:
After reading some of these reviews, I'm seeing that I'm not the only one with the streaking issue. For reference: I'm 41 with combination skin. 

I tried this on in-store. Wasn't in love with it, but P√ºr changed their tinted moisturizer's colors and they no longer looked good on my skin.

This tint has almost no coverage. It is watery and streaks. Be careful because it will just run out of the tube. It also clings to my dry spots (mostly my chin and around the nose).  I definitely moisturize before I put it on. I've tried it with a brush. I've tried it with a sponge. I've tried it with my fingertips. But it's all the same. It just looks horrible and I could not recommend this.

reviews.headline: Terrible
reviews.comments: Super greasy and streaky whether you use a brush or sponge. I understand its a skin tint but has zero coverage. Separating on my nose and chin and will cling on to dry spots. 0/10 recommend

reviews.headline: Buy this if you want a rash
reviews.comments: Left a rash after being on my skin for 2 minutes. The burning started and I washed it off immediately, and this is what I was left with. There is virtually no coverage. Buy a tinted sunscreen, or a better skin tint like the one from Ilia.

reviews.headline: Read the Reviews
reviews.comments: Should have taken the reviews seriously‚Ä¶ If I had kept the box it would be returned‚Ä¶. It is a watery mess‚Ä¶ There is a chemical odor‚Ä¶ And the color is off‚Ä¶probably due to the consistency‚Ä¶ I used the previous version of this product for years‚Ä¶and am extremely disappointed with this "new and improved" version of the product‚Ä¶. Nothing stays the same‚Ä¶ What was wrong with old Tinted Moisturizer that it needed to be changed‚Ä¶watered down‚Ä¶? This was a total waste of money‚Ä¶ this tinted moisturizer will go down drain where it belongs‚Ä¶! (Don't set the tube in the upright position on the cap‚Ä¶it will be a mess when opened‚Ä¶)

reviews.headline: Horrible
reviews.comments: At first glance this seemed promising but about only and hour the product caked and separated on my skin, this isnt the worst part. It gave me a severe reaction, im now walking around with a painful rash on my face. I will be returning this.

reviews.headline: Good product
reviews.comments: Just a skin tint, has lots of fragrance in it.

reviews.headline: Love it, perfect "no makeup" glow
reviews.comments: I love this for a "no makeup" glow. I waited 20 min after my skin care and applied using my fingers. I was so happy it went on flawlessly and blended so nicely. Truly looks like my skin but better. It feels hydrating and lightweight, and lasted all day without creasing. Love it!

reviews.headline: Probably the worst one I've ever tried
reviews.comments: Greasy, patchy, never sets. Maybe user error, maybe i didnt have proper prep, but i tried to give it the benefit of the doubt. Never worked for me once. Such a shame because it was a perfect shade match and i wanted it to work so bad.

reviews.headline: Absolutely horrible
reviews.comments:
Leaves skin textured looking, cake even after moisturizing. I have combination skin. It makes you
Look orange matter how light shade is

media.headline: Finally A Skin Tint For My Skin Tone! üñ§
media.caption: Vitamin Skin Tint SPF 15 - Light 3

media.headline: Finally A Skin Tint For My Skin Tone! üñ§
media.caption: Bobbi Brown Vitamin Skin Tint SPF 15

media.headline: Very natural, very sheer, smells so good!
media.caption: After 8 hours of wear.

faceoff_positive.comments:
I've been seeing more skin tints hitting the market and until now hadn't found a good match. I was gifted this New Vitamin Enriched Skin Tint complimentary from Bobbi Brown and I am so happy because it matches my skin tone perfectly! üñ§

This tint is amazing on my super dry skin! It's packed with Vitamins B, C, D and E. It contains Cactus Flower, SPF 15 and Pigment-Flex Technology, which helps shades melt seamlessly into skin, it gives sheer coverage that adapts to a range of skin tones. I was shocked how well this blended into my skin! The color match was perfect and there was no fading, creasing or settling. üñ§

This Bobbi Brown skin tint is sweat and humidity resistant and gives me 12 hour moisture and true wear. It contain hyaluronic acid to help with moisture and Shea butter to soften and condition. I'm so happy that I have finally found a skin tint that works for my skin! Usually most tints aren't a color match and end up settling into my fine lines and large pores. Not this Bobbi Brown tint though! I am definitely loving how my skin looks with this tint and am all for trying more from Bobbi Brown! üñ§
faceoff_positive.headline: Finally A Skin Tint For My Skin Tone! üñ§

faceoff_negative.comments: Do not be fooled by the sales staff!  I used BB Oil Free Tinted Moisturizer in Extra Light tint for decades.  The new owners discontinued it and they expect you to love this. First, if you have the slightest bit of oil in your skin, expect to be shiny within minutes of wearing this.  Also, the colors are now terrible.  I have fair skin with cool undertones‚Äîthat doesn't exist anymore in the right shade of fair.  It's also thick‚Äîthe consistency is more mashed avocado than creamy light mayo. Very difficult to spread evenly with your fingers (as suggested) because it locks in where you first begin so you use more to get even coverage and then it looks caked on. Gone are the days of the barely there, light coverage that simply evens your skin tone. I used to get so many compliments on my skin, not anymore with this nasty junk. And don't get me started on the perfume smell. Puke. Super disappointing.  Buyer beware.
faceoff_negative.headline: Nasty replacement for beloved tinted moisturizer
